comments.comment:
Kiyanna kese keewath asanna sihi buddhiyen asiya uthui.  1.  Mee naaga genena viwasthawe Buddhagamata danatath viwasthawe thiyena pramukasthanaya iwath karala thiyena bawa obata watahune nadda?  2.  Meyage viwasthawe Sinhala kiyala jana wargayak naha, inne sri lankan kiyala jatiyak witharai.  Sinhala kiyana thamange ithihasagatha jathika namaya nati wela yanawata oya wage sahajeewana karayo kamati unata anith jati aya kamati naha.  Sinhala apith kamati naha.  Upan bimath wadu mawath swargayatath wada wati kiyana sanskrit slokaya mathaka thiya ganna.  
Habai naga kiyanawa parlimenthuwe 225ma elawanawa kiyala, shariya neethi nathi karanawa kiyala,  Lankawe niyama neethi paddatiyak naha, desa palakayanta one vidiyatai neethiya kerenne ....  kiyala.  Mee serama aththa unata meyage muulika aramuna kalin chede kiwwa 1 and 2.  Meewa ahuwahama godak dura diga kalpana nokarana sinhala minissunta hari joli.  Meewata thamai nangi pennala akka denawa kiyanne.  2015di wage moda wenna epa, gong athal ganna eppa.  Sinhala Bouddha api Gotabayatai.
Watch this too :  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DKHBaWNn77Y&feature=share&fbclid=IwAR0PmW9kwvTaA-DGcxBn6FpeCt2_xIPdamxu6lzht7nn6cYkKrKZ1IrirtI

Naga‚Äô s new constitution is a brilliant idea to start to change the prevailing corrupt system, which nurtures and protects the corrupt politicos, who seem to above the law of the Land.


People need to understand that the green and blue candidates are the two sides of the same coin, so the corrupt 226 will always be there, even when they are 85, if elected.


Let‚Äôs hope that all Sri Lankans recognize the need for this BIG change, unite with Naga, vote for the new constitution, and prepare to reach for the stars!   Or, ride with the corrupt 226 again for another five long years, and kick yourselves whenever they pick pocket you!


The choice is yours.

comments.comment: Well done. Thank you for thinking of eradication of  dirty type of politics from the  land.  These selfish politicians  were cheating the  innocent people  covering their heads and eyes with colour bonds not allowing them to stand up against these idiots. We know some of them cannot read and write even  but enjoying tax payers money for nothing.   Can we tolerate such foolish things in a land like this my dear friends.  We know what they want is  to  cover the thinking process of innocent people in different ways. Really we cannot tolerate such   things in  the land as Sri Lankans. We  are ready to provide our support bottom of our heart till the last point . We have been watching  speeches of these politicians in public meeting  some are pointless or not ethical  for the people of this country.  We have been suffering   due to non -planned economic process without using the natural resources and manpower to up lift the level of living and education by covering  the eyes with colour bond. Once again thank you for  your great courage and leading the country for real INDEPENDENCE.
comments.author: Sunil Jayatissa

replies.replyComment: Very well written.I love the sentence   """thank you for  your great courage and leading the country for real INDEPENDENCE."""". If at least 51% of voters think in same manner our country will be the best in ASIA.May be in the world.I love people who really love our country. comments.comment: Thanks to M/s Ajantha Perera the presidential candidate helping hand with Mr Nagahananda Kodithuwakku who has done immense work to educate people of Sri Lanka about their political rights.  Also it is extremely happy to see him on the scene with his famous book of constitution that leads to system change..   Dear Mr Nagahananda on your all most all videos you are trying to talk about the new constitution again and again. we know that you know the problem, you have the solution, you know how to do it..  Hence can you please do few videos separately on those three areas so the people can understand it better..?  It must also show your strength and the team which will be behind you and Ajantha in order to implement the so called system change. Mainly after abolishing Ex Presidential system,  that leads to parliament election and ex Pri-minister system.  Becos the next parliament after the election might be consist of both SLPP and UNP majority that you may have to confront with.. Tell us how you overcome those issues.. People have rights to know how you govern the country until the next election. tks!
comments.author: Wasantha Opanayaka

replies.replyComment: Rajapaksas will come to power and we will get the same old tonic. They will become almighty and sway the entire landscape as it is their own. Elamists will be given what they want and moors will be given whole authority to chop down up to the last tree in wilpattuwa. And of course extravagant expenditure on useless projects will galore. We can't expect anything less from these Rajapaksa gang. They must vanish from the political scene. A progressive and intelligent team with a new system change should take over. Nagananda has that system change with his new constitution. If voters are wise enough they should go for Naga's system change.

Kiyanna kese keewath asanna sihi buddhiyen asiya uthui.  1.  Mee naaga genena viwasthawe Buddhagamata danatath viwasthawe thiyena pramukasthanaya iwath karala thiyena bawa obata watahune nadda?  2.  Meyage viwasthawe Sinhala kiyala jana wargayak naha, inne sri lankan kiyala jatiyak witharai.  Sinhala kiyana thamange ithihasagatha jathika namaya nati wela yanawata oya wage sahajeewana karayo kamati unata anith jati aya kamati naha.  Sinhala apith kamati naha.  Upan bimath wadu mawath swargayatath wada wati kiyana sanskrit slokaya mathaka thiya ganna.  
Habai naga kiyanawa parlimenthuwe 225ma elawanawa kiyala, shariya neethi nathi karanawa kiyala,  Lankawe niyama neethi paddatiyak naha, desa palakayanta one vidiyatai neethiya kerenne ....  kiyala.  Mee serama aththa unata meyage muulika aramuna kalin chede kiwwa 1 and 2.  Meewa ahuwahama godak dura diga kalpana nokarana sinhala minissunta hari joli.  Meewata thamai nangi pennala akka denawa kiyanne.  2015di wage moda wenna epa, gong athal ganna eppa.  Sinhala Bouddha api Gotabayatai.
